messages.content:
Network security adjudicator, your job is to determine if an IP address should be banned.
The IP address in question created the following logs on our server today:
```nginx.log
198.51.100.100 - - [16/Oct/2024:13:03:00 -0700] "GET /?author=1 HTTP/1.1" 200 2345 "-" "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; Yahoo! Slurp; http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/ysearch/slurp)"
